channel.title: backbone on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in backbone on Nicola Iarocci

item.title: Backbone.JS vs Angular.JS: dissacrare il mito
item.description: Lettura interessante se state cercando quello giusto fra le decine di front-end framework disponibili. I love the way how each and every discussion turns into the war of the frameworks. I have worked with BackboneJS and AngularJS quite extensively and have come across most of their short comings in production. So, you dont really have to take this analysis with a grain of salt. I would be happy to take back anything that I have said if it turns out to be wrong.
